result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: DOCTOR'S REPORT RETURN Transcript commencing MARCH 18, 2015 received and filed.  Original transcript in case file 15CF360 (8 Pages). kl

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Laurence M Moon.  Defendant Demetri I Scott in custody.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Plea/sentencing on today.  Pursuant to plea negotiations for global resolution the parties have resolved this case.  On state's motion, the Court orders this case DISMISSED and READ-IN for the purpose of sentencing in case 15CF360.
and Restitution Worksheet, filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Laurence M Moon.  Defendant Demetri I Scott in custody.  
Megan Patricia Carmody for Jeremy Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for Return on Doctor's Report Return.
Hearing proceeded.  

Parties in receipt of report authored by Deborah L. Collins, Psy.D.  There being no challenge to the report dated 6-06-15 by the state, defense counsel or defendant, the court found the defendant competent to proceed and ordered the proceedings reinstated.  Bail argument made by defense followed by the state.  Defense bail motion denied; bail to remain as set prior to proceedings being suspended.  Defendant reordered (tot) to Justice Point for Supervision.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter.  Filed, Pretrial Release Conditions Order.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Laurence M Moon in court, defendant Demetri I Scott not in court, in custody.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for Doctor's Report Return.  Case passed to allow defense time to review the report with defendant.  Defense prepared to proceed.  Branch 21 in jury trial and unable to hear this matter on today; adjourned date selected.  Defense requests to address bail on the next date.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for March 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Report dated 3-06-15 authored by Deborah L. Collins, Psy. D., received and filed.
Order for Competency Examination by Department of Health Services, signed and filed.

Attorney Laurence M Moon in court, defendant Demetri I Scott not in court, in custody.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Appearance of the defendant waived for the purpose of today's proceedings.  Court is advised by defense counsel that there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  The court suspended the proceedings and ordered the defendant be examined by the Department of Health Services.  Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.
  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint DISCHARGE REPORT, received and filed.
Milwaukee County Pretrial Services Violation Report.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Laurence M. Moon.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Status conference held between the parties.  Attorney Moon appears as successor counsel.   Parties engaged in negotitions; possible deferred prosecution agreement.  
  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for February 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, received and filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Derek H. Goodman.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Defense indicates that he has discovered a conflict.  Motion to withdraw heard and granted by the Court.  Defense to notify the public defenders office of the need for appointment of counsel.  Defendant in compliance with Justice Point supervision at this time.  Status conference scheduled for November 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point report, received and filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Derek H. Goodman.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for deferred prosecution hearing on today.  Defense reports that there is a waiting list with both monitoring agencies.  Defense request for adjournment granted.  Justice Point report reviewed with the parties.  Defendant admonished by the Court; no further action requested by the state.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for November 11, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point report, received and filed.
VIOLATION REPORT (missed office contact), received and filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Derek H. Goodman.  Megan Carmody for Jesica Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Defendant missed TAD appointment for monitoring agency.  Statement made by the state and defense.  New date selected with the parties.  Defense advised this case is being reassigned to ADA Jeremy Arn as of 9-08-14.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for October 6, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point report, received and filed.
VIOLATION Report (missed office contact on 8-20-14), received and filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Derek H. Goodman.  Jesica Ann Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Status conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 27, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint report, received and filed.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision for mental health and medication monitoring.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  No Contact with John D.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Derek H Goodman.  Jesica A Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Scheduling conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in negotiations. Defendant discharged from JusticePoint.  Defendant verbally admonished by the court.  The Court orders a referral back to JusticePoint; defendant to report forthwith.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Discharge Report, received and filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Derek H Goodman.  Randy Sitzberger for James Griffin for Jesica A Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound Defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.   Original Information received and filed.  Copy given to Defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 25, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Justice Point Pretrial Program Report dated 6/11/14.
css

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with Attorney Derek H Goodman.  Jesica A Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for Review hearing.  Parties in receipt of report dated 5-20-14 authored by John Pankiewicz.  The Court holds colloquy with the defendant as to opinion offered by the doctor.  There being no challenges to the report by the state, defense, or defendant.  The Court finds the defendant competent to proceed and reinstates the proceedings.  Bail to remain as previously set prior to proceedings being suspended.  Defendant to report to JusticePoint office forthwith.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 12, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Doctor's report dated 5-20-2014, received and filed
dated 3-31-14 from the Outpatient Competency Restoration Program, received and filed.  Defendant accepted into the program; no action required from the court at this time.
JusticePoint, received and filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with Attorney Derek H. Goodman.  Jesica Ann Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Matter before the Court for Doctor's Report Return.  Parties in receipt of report authored by Dr. Deborah Collins dated 2-27-14.  There being no challenges to the report by the state, defense, and defendant, the Court finds the defendant incompetent to proceed at this time, but likely to become competent within the statutory time period.  The court orders the proceedings suspended and committed the defendant to the Department of Health Services.  On motion of the state, the Court ordered a referral to the Outpatient Competency Restoration Program.  Defendant to continue to comply with JusticePoint supervision.  Order of Commitment for Treatment (Incompetency) signed and filed.
  Review hearing scheduled for June 2, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
dated 2-27-14 authored by Deborah Collins, received and filed.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Derek H Goodman.  Benjamin A Wesson appeared for Jesica Ballenger for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel informs the court that he believes that the defendant is not competent to proceed. Pursuant to Sec. 971.14(2) Wis. Stats., Court ordered proceedings suspended and defendant to be examined by the Wisconsin Forensic Unit.  Order For Competency Examination, signed and filed. Copy forwarded to the Forensic Unit.  Court ordered case adjourned for doctor report return in Branch 21.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for 03-04-2014 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on February 3, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Preliminary Hearing date needs to be changed to due amount of bail set for the Co-Defendant.  Notice to Defendant this date.
bm

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Demetri I Scott in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Defendant Demetri I Scott in custody.  Kevin Shomin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 6, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
